Position.name: Skill Actions position
Position.hint: Position in the skill page; Top : right after Strikes, Bottom : At the end

IconStyle.name: Icon Style
IconStyle.hint: Icon style on the skill; Action Cost Icon: For the actions cost icon, Skill Icon: For the skills icon if it's available

UnequipAll.Tooltip: Toggle hidden actions. Hold alt when clicking to make unequip/equip all skills.
